title: The St Arnaud boys
creator_contributor_role: Victoria. Dept. of Planning and Community Development, partner

Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Australia. Army. Australian and New Zealand Army Corps
Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Australia. Army
abstract: "I remember us all catching the early morning train. None of us knew what to expect."
description: Norm started his life in the Army with six other local boys from his local area.  He really enjoyed the mateship and sense of community he shared with them, and reminisces on the good times they had over the years. The mateship still lives on today when Norm catches up with them back in their home town, St Arnaud.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2002737; In our words: stories from Victorian veterans [St Arnaud Veterans]; Active; 2011
